msg: Make people tell APR where to put the named pipe.  Also fixed the docs for

author: rbb
msg: If we don't have threads in APR, we can't create INTRAPROCESS locks.
This also keeps us from trying to use thread locks when we aren't using
threads.  Should be a small performance improvement.
